searchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for any search bar.

filtersPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text when there are no filters to display.

usersPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text when there are no users to display.

submissionsPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text when there are no submissions to display.

confirmDiscard.description: Confirmation dialog text when a filter has changes but is not saved.

confirmDelete.description: Confirmation dialog text when the user clicks a delete button for a filter.

confirmEraseData.description: Confirmation dialog text when the user wants to purge all extension data.

popupToggleApp.description: Title text for the popup power button.

popupNewFilter.description: Text for the popup filter button.

popupMasterList.description: Text for the popup master list button.

popupOptions.description: Text for the popup options button.

popupToggleFilter.description: Title text for toggle switches on the popup.

popupRemoveFilter.description: Title text for the delete button next to each filter on the popup.

editorNewText.description: Text on new filter button in the editor.

editorNewTitle.description: Tooltip text for the new filter button in the editor.

editorSaveText.description: Text on save filter button in the editor.

editorSaveTitle.description: Tooltip text for the save filter button in the editor.

editorCopyText.description: Text on copy filter button in the editor.

editorCopyTitle.description: Tooltip text for the copy filter button in the editor.

editorLoadText.description: Text on load filter button in the editor.

editorLoadTitle.description: Tooltip text for the load filter button in the editor.

editorDeleteText.description: Text on delete filter button in the editor.

editorDeleteTitle.description: Tooltip text for the delete filter button in the editor.

editorImportText.description: Text on import filter button in the editor.

editorImportTitle.description: Tooltip text for the import filter button in the editor.

editorExportText.description: Text on export filter button in the editor.

editorExportTitle.description: Tooltip text for the export filter button in the editor.

editorSelectFilter.description: Text preceding the filter selection dropdown in the editor.

editorTitle.description: Title text of the filter editor main container.

editorIDText.description: Label text for the ID field of the editor.

editorIDTitle.description: Tooltip text for the ID field of the editor.

editorNameText.description: Label text for the name field of the editor.

editorNameTitle.description: Tooltip text for the name field of the editor.

editorNamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the name field of the editor.

editorTypeText.description: Label text for the type field of the editor.

editorTypeTitle.description: Tooltip text for the type field of the editor.

editorColorText.description: Label text for the color field of the editor.

editorColorTitle.description: Tooltip text for the color field of the editor.

editorTextColorText.description: Label text for the text color field of the editor.

editorTextColorTitle.description: Tooltip text for the text color field label of the editor.

editorColorPicker.description: Tooltip text for the color inputs of the editor.

editorEnableText.description: Label text for the enable field of the editor.

editorEnableTitle.description: Tooltip text for the enable field of the editor.

editorPreviewText.description: Label text for the tag preview of the editor.

editorPreviewTitle.description: Tooltip text for the tag preview of the editor.

editorUsersText.description: Description of what the users textarea box is for.

editorCleanup.description: Text on the button that organizes the entries in a textarea box.

editorLength.description: Label text for the number of entries in a textarea box.

editorSubmissionsText.description: Description of what the submissions textarea box is for.

editorImportWatchlist.description: Text on the button that retrieves one's watchlist and merges it with the users.

editorImportGallery.description: Text on the button that retrieves one's gallery and adds it to the submissions.

editorImportFavorites.description: Text on the button that retrieves one's favorites and adds it to the submissions.

editorKeywordsText.description: Description of the use of keywords.

editorScanTitlesTitle.description: Tooltip text for the option to scan the titles of submissions.

editorScanTitlesText.description: Label text for the option to scan the titles of submissions.

editorScanUsernamesTitle.description: Tooltip text for the option to scan the names of users.

editorScanUsernamesText.description: Label text for the option to scan the names of users.

editorPreferenceTitle.description: Tooltip text for the option to filter by user when scanning submissions.

editorPreferenceText.description: Label text for the option to filter by user when scanning submissions.

editorKeywordSupport.description: Link text that tells the client that keywords can be any regular expressions.

editorOptionsTitle.description: Title text for the blacklisting options category of the editor.

editorOptionsText.description: Description of the blacklisting options category of the editor.

editorOptionAvatarText.description: Label text for the avatar option.

editorOptionAvatarTitle.description: Tooltip text for the avatar option.

editorOptionUsernameText.description: Label text for the username option.

editorOptionUsernameTitle.description: Tooltip text for the username option.

editorOptionCommentText.description: Label text for the comment option.

editorOptionCommentTitle.description: Tooltip text for the comment option.

editorOptionThumbnailText.description: Label text for the thumbnail option.

editorOptionThumbnailTitle.description: Tooltip text for the thumbnail option.

editorOptionTitleText.description: Label text for the title option.

editorOptionTitleTitle.description: Tooltip text for the title option.

editorOptionLinkText.description: Label text for the link option.

editorOptionLinkTitle.description: Tooltip text for the label option.

optionsTitle.description: Title for the extension options page.

optionsEnable.description: Text for the option to toggle the extension on or off.

optionsScan.description: Text for the option to make webpage scanning happen more than once.

optionsSort.description: Text for the option to auto-sort filter contents.

optionsCleanup.description: Text for the option to cleanup profile pages.

optionsNotifications.description: Text for the option to show browser notifications.

optionsReset.description: Text for the button that resets extension options.

optionsPurgeData.description: Text for the button that removes all app data.

optionsImportAppData.description: Text for the button that imports app data.

optionsExportAppData.description: Text for the button that exports app data.

listTitle.description: Title of the master list page.

listAddAll.description: Label for add-all dropdown used on master list and content pages.

listRemoveAll.description: Label for remove-all dropdown used on master list and content pages.

pageContentsTitle.description: Title of the page contents window.

pageShowWindowText.description: Text on the button that shows the page contents window.

pageShowWindowTitle.description: Title text for the button that shows the page contents window.

mainScanResults.description: Notification title text for the results of scanning a webpage.

scanNowText.description: Button text for manually activating the page scanner.

genericErrorText.description: Text that is displayed when an app error is encountered.
